title: Apple salad
ingredients: ['6 medium apples', '100g walnuts, chopped', '100g flaked almonds', '50g candied cherries , chopped (optional)', '1 tablespoon pistachios, chopped', 'For the dressing', '60g caster sugar', '1 lemon, juiced', '1/2 lemon, zested', '2 shot glasses arak', '1 tablespoon honey', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon desiccated coconut']
